summary: An essential resource hub focusing on personal and strategic growth. It features a course titled 'Align the Misaligned' dedicated to building confidence, strategic planning, and networking through strengths and weaknesses analysis, SWOT analysis, and critical asks formulation. Ideal for individuals and startups seeking to enhance their strategic mindset and self-awareness.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
